ModMetaData.name: S.A.L.: Auto-crafters: Overloaded
ModMetaData.author: Spdskatr
ModMetaData.description: Project S.A.L.: Station Automation and Logistics\n\nS.A.L. is a RimWorld modding project that hopes to make most crafting jobs of the colony doable without colonist interaction. Now with much much more!
